translation.en: From Independence Mall, this is news radio, KYW Philadelphia ten--
translation.es: Desde el centro comercial Independence, estas son las noticias, KYW Filadelfia diez...

translation.en: Absolute chaotic scene behind me right now at this intersection,
translation.es: Una escena de absoluto caos a mis espaldas
en esta intersección, donde esta tarde

translation.en: a bus driver collided with several oncoming vehicles,
translation.es: un conductor chocó contra varios vehículos,

translation.en: - one of them a cement mixer. - All right, here we go.
translation.es: uno de ellos una mezcladora de cemento.

translation.en: A huge mess on the scene here right now.
translation.es: Hay un gran caos en estos momentos.

translation.en: We're still not clear as to what exactly happened here,
translation.es: Aún no tenemos claro qué pasó exactamente,

translation.en: whether the driver passed out while operating the vehicle
translation.es: si el conductor se desmayó mientras operaba el vehículo

translation.en: or simply died at the wheel.
We don't have a cause of death at this point,
translation.es: Por ahora no existe una causa de muerte.

translation.en: but some of our medical experts are talking about the fact
that it could've been a heart attack - or a stroke. - Mmm, perfect pancake!
translation.es: de que podría haber sido un infarto o un ataque.

translation.en: We don't have a name on the driver, no information at all.
translation.es: No tenemos el nombre del conductor u otros detalles.

translation.en: Police have not released that at this point.
translation.es: La policía aún no publica nada.

translation.en: - Next of kin still being notified. -
translation.es: Los familiares aún no son notificados.

translation.en: - which is a minor miracle. - Fuck.
translation.es: lo cual es un milagro menor.

translation.en: Speaking with some of the officers here on the scene...
translation.es: Hablando con algunos oficiales en la escena...

translation.en: - Shit. - There could have been more fatalities
is what these officers are saying to me. Uh, we...
translation.es: respecto a lo que me informan.

translation.en: Feels like she got your big feet.
translation.es: Siento que tiene los pies grandes.

translation.en: Maybe I'll pick up some Doc Martens on the way out.
translation.es: Tal vez le compre unos Doc Martens.

translation.en: Had that weird pregnancy dream again.
translation.es: De nuevo tuve ese raro sueño de embarazo.

translation.en: We were still on the beach, but a little different this time.
translation.es: Aún estaba en la playa, pero esta vez era algo diferente.

translation.en: I couldn't see you, but I knew you were with me,
translation.es: No podía verte, pero sabía que estabas conmigo,

translation.en: like how sometimes you just know things like that in a dream.
translation.es: como que a veces uno sabe cosas así en un sueño.

translation.en: Honey, you seen my other shoe?
Your shoes are under the bed.
So we were standing in the shallow water,
translation.es: Así que estábamos en el agua poco profunda,

translation.en: and we were playing that game like you play as a kid.
translation.es: y jugábamos a ese juego, como cuando jugabas de niño.

translation.en: When the tide would go back out
translation.es: Cuando la marea volvía a bajar,

translation.en: and sink lower into the wet sand.
translation.es: y te hundías en la arena húmeda.

translation.en: I just kept sinking down and down,
and no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't get up.
translation.es: y por más que lo intentaba, no podía levantarme.

translation.en: But these graveyard shifts are the worst.
translation.es: Pero estos turnos nocturnos son los peores.

translation.en: I'm tired of having breakfast for dinner.
translation.es: Estoy cansada de desayunar en la cena.

translation.en: - Detective's around the corner. - Mm- hmm.
But I'll bring you something back to make up for it.
translation.es: Pero te traeré algo para compensarte.

translation.en: - I look forward to being proven wrong. - Deal.
translation.es: Espero con ansias estar equivocada. Trato.

translation.en: With the shot clock winding down, Barkley coming up short once again.
translation.es: El tiempo se acaba. Charles Barkley no llega una vez más.

translation.en: Another good night of rebounding for Charles, but not enough buckets.
translation.es: Otra buena noche de rebotes para Charles, pero no lo suficiente...

translation.en: - Hey, come on, I wanna see how it ends. -
Huh, Winston Maddox, you got some amount of money riding on this tonight?
translation.es: Winston Maddox, ¿tienes algo de dinero apostado?

translation.en: And that's all she wrote, folks.
translation.es: Y el juego se acaba, amigos.

translation.en: Philadelphia loses a heartbreaker to Atlanta, 103 to 101.
translation.es: Filadelfia pierde por poco contra Atlanta, 103 a 101.

translation.en: Thought most folks think about moving out of white trash neighborhoods.
translation.es: La mayoría quiere mudarse de los barrios problemáticos.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Trust me, I'm working on it.
translation.es: Sí. Confía en mí, estoy trabajando en eso.

translation.en: You know, the first perp that ever took a swing at me was two blocks that way.
translation.es: El primer perdedor que me golpeó fue a dos cuadras por ahí.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You never mentioned it.
Yeah, you're all jokes now, but you've got a pregnant wife back there, pal.
translation.es: Eres un bromista, pero tienes una esposa embarazada.

translation.en: Back pain, feet the size of a kitchen sink.
translation.es: Dolor de espalda, pies del tamaño de un lavaplatos,
está de mal humor, tiene hambre...

translation.en: But hey, maybe you can find the guy that knocked her up
translation.es: Quizás encuentras al que la embarazó para que se haga cargo.

translation.en: - and make him deal with it. - Fuck you.
translation.es: Quizás encuentras al que la embarazó para que se haga cargo. Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: All right, what do we got?
We've got a big pile- up downtown.
translation.es: Un gran choque múltiple en el centro.

translation.en: That's bridge traffic. That's gonna be, I don't know, 30 minutes?
translation.es: Hay tráfico en un puente. ¿Eso será, no sé, 30 minutos?

translation.en: Ten spot says I'll get us there in 20.
translation.es: Diez dólares a que llegamos en 20.

translation.en: Oh, 22 minutes. You owe me ten.
You know, when he, uh, dry cleans his ties, it's full starch.
translation.es: En la titorería, sus corbatas expelen solo almidón.

translation.en: - Hey, that's my wife's brother. - Tell me he's not a dick.
translation.es: - Es hermano de mi esposa. - Dime que no es imbécil.

translation.en: - Maintain a safe distance at all times. - Keep it clear over there!
translation.es: - Mantén siempre una distancia segura. - Mantenlo despejado.

translation.en: This whole thing is nuts. You should've seen the bus driver.
translation.es: Esto es una locura. Deberías haber visto a la chofer. Te habría encantado.

translation.en: - You would have loved it. - Yeah? Why?
translation.es: Deberías haber visto a la chofer. Te habría encantado. ¿Sí? ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Oh, trust me, she's a doozy.
- Don't do it. You know how Holt gets. - I'll just take a peek.
translation.es: No lo hagas. Sabes cómo se pone Holt. Es solo un vistazo.

translation.en: Is a normal, boring shift too much to ask?
translation.es: ¿Es demasiado pedir un turno normal y aburrido?
La sangre no es de su herida.

translation.en: Oh, God, do you smell that?
then hit hard on the steering wheel.
translation.es: y se golpeó fuerte contra el volante.

translation.en: Who invited you two to the party?
Officers, I'm gonna need you to dust all this broken glass for fingerprints.
translation.es: Oficiales, voy a necesitar que busquen huellas en todo este vidrio.

translation.en: So how's my sis? She about to explode?
Yeah, any day. Uh, you know, these are--
Yep, we solved that one, Crockett.
Boys across town just caught two more bodies.
translation.es: Los muchachos encontraron dos cuerpos más.

translation.en: They said both had some kind of mark on their neck.
translation.es: Ambos tenían una especie de marca en el cuello.

translation.en: Pump your brakes, all right? You've had your five minutes.
translation.es: No sigas. Ya tuviste tus cinco minutos.

translation.en: We're gonna stay here. We'll relax.
Plenty of people can stand behind tape, yell at reporters. Come on.
translation.es: Mucha gente detrás de la cinta le grita a los reporteros. Vamos ¡Yo manejo!

translation.en: Hey, just trying to learn from the best, Detective.
translation.es: Solo trato aprender de los mejores, detective.

translation.en: - Go ahead. - Well, there was just blood everywhere.
translation.es: - Adelante. - Hay sangre por todas partes.

translation.en: But no brains on this one.
translation.es: Este no tiene trozos de cerebro.

translation.en: No kind of hemorrhage I know of includes brain disintegration.
translation.es: Ningún tipo de hemorragia incluye desintegración cerebral.

translation.en: It could be a drug thing, you know, puncture wounds.
translation.es: Podrían ser drogas, por las heridas punzantes.

translation.en: - What we need to do is run toxicology. - What do you mean, we?
translation.es: Necesitamos un examen toxicológico. ¿Cómo que necesitamos?

translation.en: Look, you were right about the bus driver, good call,
translation.es: Tenías razón sobre la chofer, bien hecho,

translation.en: but I'm running point on this. You do your job, I'll do mine.
translation.es: pero yo estoy a cargo. Haz tu trabajo y yo el mío.

translation.en: - Come on, give me a bone here. - Detective! Detective Holt!
Look, look, look, I respect the hustle, I do, - but... - Detective!
Look, even though nobody said the word serial killer out loud yet,
translation.es: Aunque nadie ha dicho todavía asesino en serie en voz alta,

translation.en: that time's coming, and when it does...
translation.es: se acerca ese momento, y cuando llegue...

translation.en: this is my first big one, okay.
translation.es: Este es mi primer gran caso.

translation.en: I need to be able to wrap my head around it on my own.
Just give me a little breathing room, all right?

translation.es: Está bien. Detective, ¿qué puede decirnos sobre las otras dos víctimas?

translation.en: Detective, what can you tell us about the other two victims?
translation.es: Detective, ¿qué puede decirnos sobre las otras dos víctimas?

translation.en: Sorry, everybody, no official statement yet.
translation.es: Lo siento, aún no hay declaración oficial.

translation.en: You know the drill, we're still collecting evidence.
translation.es: Ya saben cómo es, seguimos buscando pruebas.

translation.en: Is there a connection to the other deaths?
- What'd I tell you? He's a dick. - I can't answer that question,
and even if I could, I wouldn't do it right here, okay?
Eh, you're just making more work for yourself,
translation.es: Solo creas más trabajo para ti,

translation.en: and more importantly, more work for me.
translation.es: y lo más importante, más trabajo para mí.

translation.en: You don't want to see where this goes? Huh?
Shit. I wanna go kick bums out of the park like we're supposed to.
translation.es: Mierda. Quiero echar a los vagos del parque, como deberíamos.

translation.en: Yeah, well, bums will still be there when we're done, bud.
translation.es: Bueno, los vagos seguirán ahí cuando terminemos.

translation.en: Yeah, three bodies came in tonight, all of them had brain hemorrhaging,
translation.es: Llegaron tres cuerpos esta noche, todos con hemorragia cerebral,

translation.en: marks in the back of their neck.
Oh, I'm, uh, Officer Lockhart. This is Officer Maddox.
translation.es: Oficial Lockhart, él es el oficial Maddox.

translation.en: Okay. Well, there's been a hold placed on that report
translation.es: Bien, el informe fue puesto en espera

translation.en: - Yeah, he's family, sir. I'm sure-- - I said a hold, Officer.
translation.es: - Sí, es un familiar, estoy seguro... - Dije en espera, oficial.

translation.en: Can't break protocol every time some idiot's stuck with a needle.
translation.es: No se puede parar el protocolo cada vez que un idiota manipula una aguja.

translation.en: So it was a puncture wound.
And deep enough to impact the vertebrate.
translation.es: Profundas como para impactar al vertebrado.

translation.en: So, some kind of poison, like blowfish toxin?
translation.es: ¿Un tipo de veneno? - ¿De pez globo? - No.

translation.en: Lab techs all have hard- ons for it.
translation.es: Todos los del laboratorio están excitados.

translation.en: Because we have no idea what it is.
No one's ever seen it before.
I've got other dead people waitin'.
All right, we need to think.
You know, I think you're supposed to say Asian now.
translation.es: Creo que ahora se dice asiática.

translation.en: Whatever, as long as they keep that sweet and sour pork coming,
translation.es: Como sea, mientras tengan ese cerdo agridulce.

translation.en: I'll call 'em whatever they want. Shit.
Listen, all I'm saying is we got people getting injected
translation.es: Todo lo que digo es que a la gente le inyectan isótopos

translation.en: with a fucking isotope of all things, and nobody can tell us shit.
translation.es: Todo lo que digo es que a la gente le inyectan isótopos y nadie puede decirnos nada.

translation.en: And the times of death are minutes apart, the bodies are miles apart...
translation.es: Horas de muerte: sucesivas. Cuerpos: muy lejos uno de otro.

translation.en: I'll take crazy shit happens for 200, Alex.
translation.es: Jugaré con esas mierdas pasan por 200.

translation.en: We had three random victims with the brains melted out of their faces.
translation.es: Tuvimos tres víctimas con los sesos derretidos.

translation.en: I'll admit, it's weird, but... shit.
translation.es: Lo admito, es raro, pero... mierda.

translation.en: Remember them two yuppies washed up on the shore of the lake couple years ago?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a dos oficinistas de la orilla del lago hace dos años?

translation.en: Buck naked, bruised up. Everybody thought it was a mob hit.
translation.es: Culo desnudo, magullados, todos pensaron que había sido la mafia.

translation.en: Turns out it was just two gays, liked it rough,
translation.es: Resultó que solo eran dos gays que les gustaba duro

translation.en: having a bit too much to drink before they went skinny dipping.
translation.es: y que bebieron demasiado antes de ir a nadar desnudos.

translation.en: But you heard what the coroner said, right?
Man, your energy's all over the place, man.
translation.es: Viejo, tu energía está por todas partes.

translation.en: Let the game come to you.
translation.es: Deja que el juego venga a ti.

translation.en: You won't have time to think about shit this much. It'll be...
translation.es: No tendrás tiempo para pensar tanto. Será...

translation.en: - I hope. - Give me that ten bucks.
translation.es: Eso espero. Dame esos diez dólares.

translation.en: It's not my fault you've got a gambling problem. Give me the money.

translation.en: Hey, I'll strike you a deal here.
Uh, give me that... that for ten?
Oh, come on, I was gonna eat that.
translation.es: Qué va, me lo iba a comer.

translation.en: Units be advised 314 at Hydra on 22nd and Armory,
translation.es: Se avisa a las unidades de un 314 en Hydra, calle 22 y Armory.

translation.en: female, late teens, assaulted, blunt force to the neck.
translation.es: Mujer, de casi 20, agredida en el cuello con fuerza.

translation.en: Could you get the officer at Hydra and get me on the radio?
- Go for it, Officer Palmer. - Evening. Officer Lockhart here.
translation.es: Adelante, oficial Palmer. Buenas, oficial Lockhart por aquí.

translation.en: - All right, we're on our way. -
Girl says she was stabbed with some kind of metal tool or some shit.

translation.es: La semana pasada llegó un tipo de aquí

translation.en: egg beater stuck up his ass, I shit you not.
translation.es: con una batidora en el culo, no te miento.

translation.en: I was too impressed to be disgusted.
translation.es: Estaba demasiado impresionado para sentir asco.

translation.en: All right, tell me what happened.
She had on a blue hoodie.
Honey, you sure she's a she?
Like she was in the wrong neighborhood.
Her hand was all messed up. It was covered in dried blood.
translation.es: Tenía la mano hecha un desastre y cubierta de sangre seca.

translation.en: Okay, it's okay. Which hand? Right here.
translation.es: Todo está bien. ¿Qué mano? Justo aquí.

translation.en: Tom, I just got off with the coroner. What the hell?
translation.es: ¿Tom? Acabo de hablar con el forense.  ¿Qué diablos?

translation.en: Yeah, I was just about to get you on the radio.
Listen, she's got that shit in her bloodstream. We need to--
translation.es: Tiene esa mierda en la sangre. Debemos...

translation.en: Don't even listen to him. It's fine.
Come on, I just told him everything.
translation.es: Vamos, le acabo de contar todo.

translation.en: He's a little deaf. I want you to tell me.
translation.es: Es algo sordo. Quiero que me lo cuentes.

translation.en: and out of nowhere, this crazy chick tackles me to the ground.
translation.es: y de la nada, esta chica loca me derriba.

translation.en: These guys, they... they pulled her off me, but...
translation.es: Unos tipos me la quitaron, pero...

translation.en: she... she poked my neck with something.
translation.es: me clavó en el cuello con algo.

translation.en: We need an EMT now! Hey! Now, now, now!
Get a medic up here! Get a medic up here! Hey, hey, hey!
Stand by for a single live BOLO.
translation.es: Estén alerta a la única información.

translation.es: vista por última vez en Hydra, en calle Arch.

translation.en: Five foot six, twenties, dried blood on her left hand,
translation.es: Mide 1.70, sangre seca en la mano izquierda,
lleva una sudadera con capucha azul.

translation.en: Put your hands on your head!
suspect last seen on foot at Chestnut and University.

translation.en: This is our chance at detective.
translation.es: Es la chance para ser detectives.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're not thinking about it.

translation.en: I'm thinking I got the wrong skin tone for that.
translation.es: Creo que me equivoqué de color de piel.

translation.en: But you got that sparkling personality.
- Mm- mm- mm. - Hey. Right there.
You about to draw down on Old Saint Nick. You almost killed Christmas.
translation.es: Casi bajas al viejo San Nicolás. Casi matas a la Navidad.
¡La sospechosa se dirige al oeste por Liberty!

translation.en: I repeat, suspect heading west across Liberty!

translation.en: If you've got a badge on your chest and a gun on your hip,
translation.es: Llevas una placa y un arma en la cadera,

translation.en: Police! Move! Go! Get out of the way!
Out of the way! Go! Move!
- Lock, she went this way! - Hey!
I got this! I got this! Go around! Go around!
I gotta cut back to a pack a day.
translation.es: Debo volver a un paquete al día.

translation.en: Meet me at Girard subway station.
translation.es: Nos vemos en la estación Girard.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?
No one in and no one out!
Philly PD, get the fuck out of here!
Officer Lockhart, I've got Rosewood General on the line.
translation.es: Oficial Lockhart, tengo al hospital en la línea.
Su esposa está en trabajo de parto.

translation.en: You two, stay on this level.
Why don't you come on out?
Got the wind knocked out of me.
Fuck! I think she broke my leg.
I need an ambulance at the Girard Street subway.
translation.es: Necesito una ambulancia en el metro de calle Girard.

translation.en: Stay right there. Stay right fucking there!
Get on the ground. Hey, hey!
You fucking deaf? I said get on the ground.
translation.es: ¿Eres sorda? Dije que se tirara al suelo.

translation.en: I said get on the ground!

translation.es: LÍNEA DE CALLE BROAD ESTACIÓN GIRARD

translation.en: Whoa, pal! Hey, what are you still doing here?
Yes, sir. Uh, where's the maternity ward?
translation.es: Sí, señor. ¿Dónde está la sala de maternidad?

translation.en: Uh, next building, down the hallway, elevator to the third floor.
translation.es: Siguiente edificio, por el pasillo, ascensor al tercer piso.

translation.es: No es el momento, pero necesito revisar algunas cosas

translation.en: Okay, so far, she's a nobody,
translation.es: Hasta ahora, ella es una don nadie,

translation.en: no ID, no fingerprint matches, nothing.
translation.es: sin identificación, sin huellas dactilares, nada.

translation.en: All she had on her were these keys. We have no idea what they go to.
translation.es: Solo tenía estas llaves. No sabemos su uso.

translation.en: We're drawing a blank. Mean anything to you?
- No. - I'll need to see your revolver.
- Lockhart. Just give me one moment. - You didn't fire your weapon at all?
translation.es: Lockhart. Un momento. ¿No disparó su arma?

translation.en: They pulled a bullet from our girl's wrist...
translation.es: Le sacaron una bala de la muñeca.

translation.en: and it matches a service revolver.
- What are you talking about? - No one else reported a shot fired.
translation.es: - ¿De qué hablas? - Nadie reportó un disparo.

translation.en: We can't make heads or tails.
what happened down there, son, in the subway station?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó allá abajo en la estación de metro?

translation.en: Yes, yes. Hi, I'm... I'm Tom... Tom Lockhart.
But so far, the baby appears to be safe.
translation.es: Pero hasta ahora, el bebé parece estar a salvo.

translation.en: I'm right here. I'm right here, baby.
- It's okay. Look, I got you something. -
I got you something good. Yeah, I got you a bracelet.
translation.es: Te traje algo. Te traje un brazalete. Superaremos esto.

translation.en: We're gonna push right through this. We're gonna push right through this.
translation.es: Te traje algo. Te traje un brazalete. Superaremos esto. Lo superaremos.

translation.en: - Okay. Come on, Jeanie, one more push. - You're almost there, Mrs. Lockhart.
translation.es: - Vamos, Jeanie, una vez más. - Ya casi estás.

translation.en: The next one, big push, okay, Jeanie? Jeanie?
- What are her vitals? - Baby? Honey?!
It's okay. It's okay. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Está bien, todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: I'm here on location in Center City
translation.es: Estoy en un lugar de Center City

translation.en: on the nine- year anniversary of the Market Street murders.
translation.es: en el noveno aniversario de los asesinatos de la calle Market.

translation.en: As you can see, protesters have gathered here once again.
translation.es: Como ven, los manifestantes se han reunido nuevamente.

translation.en: They're calling for a new investigation
into the death of a still unidentified African- American suspect.
translation.es: sobre la muerte de una sospechosa afroamericano aún no identificada.

translation.en: Those gathered here believe the Philadelphia police are to blame.
translation.es: Los aquí reunidos creen que la policía de Filadelfia es culpable.

translation.en: and based on his own admission,
Yet, he could not bring her in
without throwing her in front of a train?
translation.es: sin arrojarla frente a un tren?

translation.en: They never identified the woman's body,
translation.es: Nunca identificaron el cuerpo de la mujer.

translation.en: and they never released a motive for the homicide.
translation.es: Y nunca publicaron un motivo tras el homicidio.

translation.en: And the icing on the cake is the man got a promotion.
translation.es: Y la guinda de la torta es que el hombre fue ascendido.

translation.en: Whereas there's an unfortunate divide in our community today,
translation.es: Si bien hay una desafortunada división en nuestra comunidad,

translation.en: we also have to remember the victims and their families.
translation.es: también debemos recordar a las víctimas y sus familias.

translation.en: Because there are no easy answers here,
translation.es: Porque no hay respuestas fáciles, como no las había

translation.en: just as there weren't on that night nine years ago.
translation.es: Porque no hay respuestas fáciles, como no las había en esa noche hace nueve años.

translation.en: - Daddy? - In terms of the traffic...
I thought we agreed on no more ice cream for breakfast.
translation.es: Creo que acordamos no más helado para el desayuno.

translation.es: Me pillaste. ¿Por qué no pones el mío en el refri?

translation.en: - That one! - I don't know. Are you sure?
Wow, we got so many places here.
We've got this one, we've got that one.
- Well, what do you think? - Well...
- it's not as good as last year's. - Oh.
translation.es: No es tan bueno como el del año pasado.
Los osos aman a los conejos.

translation.en: Dad, we need to hurry up.
I wanna get there right when it opens.
Honey, the bears are gonna be there all day.
translation.es: Los osos estarán ahí todo el día.

translation.en: Yeah, but brown bears are diurnal.
translation.es: Sí, pero los osos pardos son diurnos.

translation.en: So we have a better chance of seeing them in the morning.
translation.es: Tenemos más posibilidades de verlos en la mañana.

translation.en: And these. And some of these.  These are good.

translation.en: Whatever one you want. Or do you want pink?
Don't worry about them. They're just celebrating your birthday.
translation.es: No te preocupes por ellos. Celebran tu cumpleaños.

translation.en: Well, you know, some people aren't happy unless they're mad.
translation.es: Bueno, algunas personas no son felices a menos que estén enojadas.

translation.en: You'll see what I mean when you get older.

translation.es: JEANETTE LOCKHART AMADA ESPOSA Y MADRE - DESCANSA EN PAZ ¿Papi?

translation.en: Megan's dad makes his own schedule.
translation.es: El papá de Megan hace su propio horario.
El papá de Megan no es detective.

translation.en: What do you mean it's happening again?
See the body yet? Back of the neck?
Good morning to you, too. Somebody get a badge for their birthday?
translation.es: Buenos días a ti también. ¿Recibió una placa por su cumpleaños?

translation.en: I got the call just now.
I'm gonna be right back, okay?
No frowning. We're still going to the zoo, baby.
translation.es: Sin fruncir el ceño. Igual iremos al zoológico.

translation.en: Yates! Do me a solid. Look after Amy for a second.
translation.es: Yates, hazme un favor, cuida a Amy un segundo.

translation.en: - Uh... - I appreciate it. Go. Hey, stay with her.
translation.es: Te lo agradezco. Quédate con ella.

translation.en: - Have they been here all day? - All day.
translation.es: - ¿Estuviste todo el día? - Todo el día.

translation.en: I don't think it's a good habit to start bringing her to work every day.
translation.es: No creo que sea bueno traerla al trabajo todos los días.

translation.en: It's one time. It's a crime scene.
translation.es: - Es una vez. - Es una escena del crimen.

translation.en: Yeah, calm down. She's in the car. I won't have her inspecting the corpse.
translation.es: Sí, cálmate. Está en el auto. No haré que revise el cadáver.

translation.en: You didn't, uh, put flowers on her grave, did you?
translation.es: No pusiste flores en su tumba, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Jeanie. There were fresh flowers on the grave this morning.
translation.es: Jeanie. Había flores frescas en la tumba esta mañana.

translation.en: Where would they get the poison?
Labbies could never reverse- engineer this.
translation.es: El laboratorio no dio con la ingeniería inversa.

translation.en: Well, well well, now it's a party.
translation.es: Mira eso, ahora es una fiesta.

translation.en: Ooh, she's a whole year older.
You didn't go by Jeanie's grave, did you?
translation.es: No fuiste a la tumba de Jeanie, ¿verdad?

translation.en: - Who's that? - Rings a bell. Uh...
It's an anarchist. One of those Ruby Ridge types.
translation.es: Es un anarquista. De esos arios y dementes.

translation.en: Look at us, right back in it, all this Market Street shit all over again.
translation.es: Míranos, de vuelta en toda esta mierda de la calle Market.

translation.en: - Hey, man, I'll take it from here. - All right, let's see it. What do you got?
translation.es: - Oye, yo me encargo de esto. - A ver, ¿qué tienes?

translation.en: We let these insane protesters take it up a notch every year.
translation.es: Cada año dejamos que los manifestantes suban un nivel.

translation.en: - This is what we get. - Well, up a notch to murder.
translation.es: Este es el resultado. Llegaron al asesinato.

translation.en: It only takes one deranged enough to dress like her and kill like her.
translation.es: Solo hace falta un desquiciado que se vista y mate como ella.

translation.en: - Really? - If it's not one of them, who is it?
I mean, come on, you're the brilliant detectives.
- None of it makes any sense. - Has anybody else seen this?
translation.es: Nada de esto tiene sentido. ¿Alguien vio esto?

translation.en: - Not so far in security. - Good, let's keep it that way.
translation.es: Solo los de seguridad. Bien, dejémoslo así.

translation.en: No news, no talking to reporters.
translation.es: Sin noticias, sin hablar con reporteros.

translation.en: Protesters are just looking for a reason to riot.
translation.es: Los manifestantes solo buscan una razón.

translation.en: You know, there was something I never told you about that night,
translation.es: Hubo algo que nunca te conté sobre esa noche

translation.en: Things she shouldn't have been able to know.

translation.en: She said we'd see each other again.
translation.es: Dijo que nos volveríamos a ver.

translation.en: After she died, there were no more bodies.
translation.es: Después de su muerte, no hubo más muertos.

- Yeah, he's your uncle. Great job. - It is believed she may be connected to...
translation.es: - Sí, es tu tío. Buen trabajo. - Se cree que tenga relación

At the present moment, she is considered to be armed and extremely dangerous.

...es el principal objetivo de nuestro departamento.

translation.en: If you or anyone you know has any information on his woman...

translation.en: or if you've seen anyone who matches her description...

we can apprehend a vicious criminal.

translation.en: We couldn't find anything these fuckers had in common when there was four of 'em.
translation.es: No hallamos nada que tuvieran en común cuando eran cuatro.

translation.en: Adding folks doesn't make it any easier.

translation.en: These two were both left- handed.
These two both voted for Perot. Shit.
translation.es: Estos dos votaron por Perot. Mierda.

translation.en: These two have nothing in common,
translation.es: Estos dos no tienen nada en común,

translation.en: except for the fact that both their blood is red.
translation.es: excepto por el hecho de que su sangre es roja.

translation.en: We didn't release that to the press.

translation.en: How in the hell a copycat gonna know that detail?

Detective Lockhart, I've been waiting for over an hour.

translation.es: Creo que su caso se cruza con mi trabajo de manera significativa.

What you may know simply as a super moon or a blood moon

Don't do this, man, not like this.
Hey, you got a better idea, I'm all ears.

Don't use this as some kind of fucked- up way of dealing with what happened to Jeanie.

Hey. Detective Lockhart. Uh, Philly PD.
I had a guy call in and cancel.

All right. Oh, uh, you know, before I forget...

If you were a better shot, I'd be dead.
Get me the key to that plane outside.
- Here it is. - Toss me the keys.
Yeah. It's one... it's one lock 206.

Somebody give me some fuckin' bolt cutters!
You have to stop chasing me.
I'm doing all this for a reason.
That was never part of the plan.
How the hell are you alive?
when the moon sets, I can come back.

translation.en: What do you mean come back? Huh?
The more I tell you, the more you'll keep coming after me.

Vete a casa con tu hija.

Spins into the paint, hits it out to Chris Webber.

Mr. Lockhart, in answer to your numerous inquiries,
translation.es: Sr. Lockhart, en respuesta a sus numerosas preguntas,

translation.en: Thomas Lockhart. I'm... I'm a private investigator.
Wonder if I could just ask you a few questions about your husband.

translation.en: gathering information on local drug overdose cases.
translation.es: Recopilo información sobre casos de sobredosis.
Que no se salga el gato.

translation.en: I went away to see my sister for a week or so.
translation.es: Fui a ver a mi hermana por una semana.

translation.en: Cracked his head open on the desk when he fell.
translation.es: Cayó y se partió la cabeza en el escritorio.
Toda la sangre se puso negra.

translation.en: Still got one of them flags in here.
translation.es: Aún tengo una de esas banderas.

translation.en: Your husband, he, um... wrote these?
Sent them all over the country
translation.es: Los envió por todo el país

translation.en: Let people have some privacy about their ideas.
translation.es: Que la gente tenga un poco de privacidad sobre sus ideas.

translation.en: I was young and he a good dope.
translation.es: Yo era joven y él era un tonto bueno.

translation.en: But he took it pretty serious.
translation.es: Pero lo tomó muy en serio.

translation.en: You don't know, um, who he mailed all these to, do you?
translation.es: No sabe a quién le envió todo esto, ¿verdad?

translation.en: You heard of drinking the Kool- Aid?
She fuckin' made the Kool- Aid.
So they were working on this together?

translation.es: Hasta que se separaron, perra loca.

translation.en: You know where she's at now?
You keep track of the people that fucked your wife before you did?
translation.es: ¿Haces un registro de los que se follaron a tu esposa antes que tú?

translation.en: I've been pretty generous with my time.
translation.es: que he sido muy generosa con mi tiempo.

translation.en: Lots of other things a girl could be doing.
translation.es: Una chica podría estar haciendo muchas cosas.

translation.en: Well, what do you propose, Arleen?
How much you got on you?

translation.es: Ha llamado al capitán Brian Holt.

translation.en: - Come on. - Please leave a message.
- I'll get back to you soon as possible. -
We gotta meet tonight. Think I found something.
translation.es: Cancelemos lo de esta noche. Creo que encontré algo.

translation.en: And if it's, uh, not too big of a... of an ask,
translation.es: Y si no es mucho pedir,

translation.en: I need you to run a current address on a Heather Russell.
translation.es: necesito la dirección actual de Heather Russell.

translation.en: That beard's ridiculous. You look like a homeless person.

translation.en: And it's good to see you.
Can't. Aunt Maggie's taking me to King of Prussia.
translation.es: No puedo. La tía Maggie me llevará de compras.

translation.en: I could've taken you to King of Prussia, too, you know?
It's a girl's thing we're doing. Not really your scene.
translation.es: Es algo de mujeres. No es tu área, en verdad.

translation.en: George is gonna stay around here, so...

Right, you told me about him before.
How's staying with Holt working out?

translation.en: I mean, for now, you know, honey. I mean, it's just temporary.
I'll be back on track soon enough.
Uh, you know, somebody's gotta find him.
Why do you still have a scanner? You're not a cop anymore.

translation.en: Wait. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey.
Dad, I haven't worn that thing in years.

translation.en: Well, I kept the receipt, so...
Look, Ames, I know how things have been.
translation.es: Mira, Ames, sé cómo han sido las cosas.

translation.en: I'm not Mr. Ideal Dad or whatever.
translation.es: No soy el Sr. Papá Ideal o como sea.

translation.en: But I'm gonna finish this thing soon.
I promise you, and then we're gonna get back to normal.
translation.es: Te lo prometo, y luego volveremos a la normalidad.

translation.en: Just me and you, just like old times.
translation.es: Solo tú y yo, como en los viejos tiempos.

translation.en: Dad, that's not how things work. You can't just...
translation.es: Papá, así no funciona. No puedes...

translation.en: You got that address? Heather Russell?
Yeah, that's why you're here, right?
Look, for Jane and for Amy's sake,
translation.es: Mira, por Jane y por el amor a Amy,

translation.en: Hey, hey, we missed one of our victims.
translation.es: Oye, se nos pasó una víctima.
Estaba fuera de nuestra jurisdicción, entonces...

translation.en: Local boys wrote it off as a drug overdose so we never caught it.
translation.es: Los chicos pensaron que fue sobredosis, por eso no lo vimos.

translation.en: Wanted to take the country back for the true patriots.
translation.es: Quería recuperar el país para los patriotas.

translation.en: You know, homemade fertilizer bombs. You know the type.
translation.es: Bombas caseras de fertilizantes, los conoces.

translation.en: And I got his mailing list.
translation.es: Y tengo su lista de correo.

translation.en: Two of the four victims from '97 were on it.
translation.es: Dos de las cuatro víctimas del 97 estaban en ahí.

translation.en: All of 'em from '88, that's the connection.
translation.es: Todas las del 88, esa es la conexión.

translation.en: They're all part of this radical movement.
translation.es: - Son parte de ese grupo radical. - Tom...

translation.en: - Tom. - They were up to something big.
And I'm thinking that isotope that she injects them with
translation.es: Y creo que el isótopo con el que ella los inyecta

translation.en: is some high- tech way of killing people remotely.
translation.es: es una forma muy sofisticada de matar gente de lejos.

translation.en: And it's triggered from the future, maybe. I...
translation.es: Y quizás se acciona desde el futuro.

translation.en: I don't know. I don't... I don't entirely have that pinned down yet.
translation.es: No. Eso todavía no lo determino.

translation.en: and his theory about the lunar cycle bridge thing?
translation.es: y su teoría sobre el puente del ciclo lunar?

translation.en: Had to do with the moon.
translation.es: Tenía que ver con la luna.

translation.en: She gets torn apart by a train and nine years later she's back, alive and killing.
translation.es: La destrozó un tren y nueve años después regresó viva y asesinando.

translation.en: she didn't come back to life.
translation.es: Ella no volvió a la vida.

translation.en: Okay? You sound like a fuckin' insane person right now. You need help.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Suenas como un puto demente. Necesitas ayuda.

translation.es: Ella sabía cosas de mí, Holt.

translation.en: Have you completely lost your fuckin' mind?
translation.es: ¿Te volviste completamente loco? Estás hablando de un caso

translation.en: You're talking about a case... that's been cold for a fuckin' decade.
translation.es: ¿Te volviste completamente loco? Estás hablando de un caso que ha estado diez putos años sin resolver.

translation.en: You know how many murders I've had in the past week?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántos asesinatos tuve la semana pasada?

translation.en: I'm raising your own daughter, for Christ sake,
translation.es: Estoy criando a tu propia hija, por Dios,

translation.en: and you're coming to me with fucking time travel?
translation.es: ¿y vienes a mí con un puto viaje en el tiempo?

translation.en: Are you even listening to yourself?
I couldn't stop what happened to Jeanie.
translation.es: No pude evitar lo de Jeanie...
Esta es la esposa de Harold Nowak.

translation.en: All I want is her address.
And I won't ask you for nothing ever again.
translation.es: Y nunca más volveré a pedirte algo.

translation.en: You're chasing moonbeams while your own life got away.
translation.es: Persigues una fantasía mientras tu vida se desmorona.

translation.en: It's just fucking sad to watch.
It's sad that Amy has to watch it.
translation.es: Es triste que Amy tenga que verlo.

translation.en: I'm sorry for all the shit, man.
And I'm sorry for you taking care of Amy and, uh...
translation.es: Y lamento que te hagas cargo de Amy y...

translation.en: if you're serious about getting out, I got your back.
translation.es: Si de verdad quieres salirte, yo te apoyo.

translation.en: I'm gonna give the department shrink a call.
See if she can make a recommendation.
translation.es: A ver si puede hacer una recomendación.

translation.en: No, I'm a dick and I know it.
translation.es: No, soy un imbécil y lo sé.

translation.en: That's what we do, right? We take care of each other.
translation.es: Es lo que hacemos. Nos cuidamos mutuamente.

translation.en: Yes, hi, this is, uh, Captain Holt.
translation.es: Sí, hola, habla el capitán Holt.

translation.en: I just need a last known address for a Heather Russell.

translation.es: La Fábrica de Joyas tiene miles de diamantes y con precios
que garantizan el precio más bajo.

translation.es: Las pulseras de tres cuartos de quilates a 149.

translation.en: Get out of the car. Get out. Get out!
I shot her in the hand!
This is when she gets shot. I'm the one who did it. It already happened!

translation.en: But we've gotta wait nine more years, Holt.
translation.es: Tenemos que esperar nueve años, Holt.

translation.en: But listen, if we kill her, we can stop it all from happening.
translation.es: Pero escucha, si la matamos podemos evitar que pase.

translation.en: I could be there for Jeanie, Holt.
We can stop it all from happening, Holt!
Listen to me! Hey, listen to me!

translation.es: Ubicación y determinación de flujo de tiempo.
Inyección de marcas uno a tres.

translation.en: attempting termination of marks one through three.
translation.es: intento de terminación de las marcas uno a tres.

translation.en: I have brain dissolution on mark one.
translation.es: Tengo desintegración cerebral en la marca uno.

translation.en: And on marks two and three.
translation.es: Y en las marcas dos y tres.

translation.en: I think we may have a winner.
With the pairing of the coronal isotopes,
translation.es: Con la unión de los isótopos coronales,

translation.en: we could eventually be triggering this solution from a future point in time.
translation.es: podríamos desencadenar esta solución desde un punto en el futuro.
ha pasado un tiempo, así que...

translation.en: George and I have been talking it over and...
translation.es: George y yo hemos lo hablamos y...

translation.en: I'd like you to be here for it.
I think it's what Mom would have wanted, and...
translation.es: Creo que es lo que mamá hubiera querido, y...

translation.en: I think it's what I want too, so...
translation.es: Creo que es lo que yo también quiero.

translation.en: I know it's that time of year again,
translation.es: Sé que es la época del año,

translation.en: and I know things between us have been...
translation.es: y sé que las cosas entre nosotros han sido...

translation.en: But I'd still love it if you could make it.
translation.es: Pero me encantaría que pudieras venir.

translation.en: I knew you'd be back, Mr. Lockhart.
I really am sorry about all this.
You're a hard man to find, Rao. You disappeared on me.
translation.es: Eres difícil de encontrar, Rao. Desapareciste.

translation.en: Of all people, you should understand an obsession with work.
translation.es: Entre todos, tú deberías entender una obsesión.

translation.en: Yeah, speaking of work, you can just let me out right here.
translation.es: Sí, hablando de trabajo, puedes dejarme aquí.

translation.en: I'm afraid I cannot do that.
If you don't, she keeps killing.
translation.es: Si no lo haces, ella seguirá matando.

translation.en: Changing the world is a bloody business, Thomas.
translation.es: Cambiar el mundo es un asunto sangriento.

translation.en: I think we're both a little beyond the pale, really.
translation.es: Creo que los dos superamos lo aceptable.

translation.en: I'll be keeping you in a safe place for the next few days.
translation.es: Te mantendré en un lugar seguro los próximos días.

translation.en: It was your investigation that made me realize she wasn't a murderer at all...
translation.es: Tu investigación hizo que me diera cuenta de que no era una asesina,

translation.en: and a culmination of my own research.
translation.es: La culminación de mi propia investigación.

translation.en: I'm developing the technology she'll use one day.
translation.es: Estoy desarrollando la tecnología que usará algún día.
Bueno, que está usando ahora, la verdad.

translation.en: Time travel is complicated. Hard for even me to wrap my head around.
translation.es: Viajar en el tiempo es complicado. Hasta para mí.

translation.en: To stop something much, much worse.
Imagine you could erase the American Civil War.
translation.es: Imagina que puedes borrar la Guerra de Secesión.

translation.en: Robert E. Lee? Lincoln? All the Confederate and Union leaders?
translation.es: ¿A Robert E. Lee? ¿Lincoln? ¿A los líderes de ambos bandos?

translation.en: But that might not be enough to erase an idea.
translation.es: Quizás no es suficiente para borrar una idea.

translation.en: Maybe we have to kill the people who made them who they are,
translation.es: Tal vez hay que matar a quienes los influenciaron,

translation.en: who gave them their moral and political beliefs.
translation.es: a quienes les dieron sus creencias morales y políticas.

translation.en: How far back would you have to go to snuff out the spark that lit the fuse?
translation.es: ¿Qué tan atrás tendrías que ir para apagar la chispa que prendió la mecha?

translation.en: But if you eliminated the right combination of people,
translation.es: Pero si eliminaras a la combinación correcta de personas,

translation.en: until you got to the exact start of it,
translation.es: hasta que llegaras al comienzo mismo,

translation.en: until you got to the one that undoes it all...
translation.es: hasta que llegaras al que lo deshace todo...
Y eso es lo que hace.

translation.en: And I won't let you stop her.
translation.es: Y no dejaré que la detengas.

translation.en: We can't feel it's pull, but we know it's always there.
translation.es: No podemos sentirla, pero sabemos que siempre está ahí.

translation.en: You know, the moon is responsible for conditions that allow life on Earth.
translation.es: La luna es responsable de las condiciones para la vida en la Tierra.

translation.en: Well, now, it's responsible for us being able to save ourselves
translation.es: Ahora, es responsable de que podamos salvarnos

translation.en: You have to let her finish!
You know, when I kill you...
you'll never be able to kill anybody.
Some version of me won't have to chase you.
translation.es: Una versión mía no tendrá que perseguirte.

translation.en: the world as you know it will end in a very short time.
translation.es: el mundo como lo conoces acabará en muy poco tiempo.

translation.en: You're not the only one trying to change the past.
translation.es: No eres la única que intenta cambiar el pasado.

translation.en: I've known you my entire life.
You're the one who told me to take this job.
translation.es: Tú me dijiste que aceptara este trabajo.

translation.en: And you taught me how to ride a bicycle.
translation.es: Y me enseñaste a andar en bicicleta.

translation.en: You made me my first ice cream pancakes.
translation.es: Y me preparaste los primeros panqueques con helado.

translation.en: And you held me on the day I was born.
translation.es: Y me ayudaste el día que nací.

translation.en: you actually come around to what I'm doing.
translation.es: en realidad te das cuenta lo que hago.

translation.en: You have to go back and you have to stop me.
Time travel is a one- way trip.
translation.es: El viaje en el tiempo es un viaje de ida.

translation.en: I can't go back until my mission's complete.
translation.es: No puedo regresar hasta que mi misión esté completa.

translation.en: If it begins with you warning me here in this beach...
translation.es: Si empieza con tus advertencias aquí en esta playa...

translation.en: then it always ends with me dying.
- I'm sorry. - I have to go.
- I'm sorry. - I have to go.
an ordinary man parked an ordinary truck
translation.es: un hombre común estacionaba un camión normal
lleno de explosivos caseros en el centro

translation.en: His attack was just the first.
Eleven thousand people died the first morning.
translation.es: Once mil personas murieron la primera mañana.

translation.en: Millions more in the Civil War that followed.
translation.es: Millones más murieron en la Guerra Civil que siguió.

translation.en: It made monsters out of men.
The voice that gave birth to a movement...
translation.es: La voz que dio origen a un movimiento...

translation.en: ...turned a small crack into a great divide.
translation.es: ...convirtió una pequeña grieta en una gran división.

translation.en: It drowned out the best of us.
So we found a way to silence it.
translation.es: Así que hallamos la manera de silenciarlo.

translation.en: We found a way to undo the damage.
translation.es: Encontramos la manera de deshacer el daño...

translation.en: I volunteered to untell the story.
translation.es: Me ofrecí para omitir la historia.

translation.en: I came back to erase an idea.
Because some thoughts are meant to be buried.
translation.es: Porque algunas ideas están destinadas a ser enterradas.
Algunas incluso antes de que empiecen.

translation.en: When the war between us all disappears...
translation.es: Cuando desaparezca la guerra entre nosotros...

translation.en: There will be no great tale in your time.
translation.es: No habrá una gran historia en tu época.

translation.en: Just an echo of what might have been.
translation.es: Solo un eco de lo que podría haber sido.

translation.en: And it's time to start your next chapter.
translation.es: Y es hora de comenzar tu próximo capítulo.

translation.en: You will teach me how to live.
And you will make me who I am.
translation.es: Y me convertirás en quien soy.
